name: Forgotten (YourDie)
description:
We are a group of students studying Game Design and Technology at IT-University in Copenhagen. We are passionate about making games and we combine our skills to make something interesting and meaningful.

CREDITS 

Marlène Delrive: Creative Lead, Level Design, Visual Artist

Jordy van Opstal: Programmer, Project Manager

Ryan Wright: Narrative Design, Level Design

Iben Truelsen:   Research, Playtesting

Daniel Gaard Hansen: Programmer
